## CSR.fromDense() method

Constructs CSR from dense row-major matrix values.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static fromDense(m: number, n: number, dense: ArrayLike<number>): CSR;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  m | <code>number</code> | rows |
|  n | <code>number</code> | columns |
|  dense | <code>ArrayLike&lt;number&gt;</code> | matrix values |

<b>Returns:</b>

`CSR`
